careerBackground: From a young age I began using graphic design and 3D design tools and later learned web technologies such as HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Flash and PHP. I started my professional career in London working on various projects ranging from websites and advertisements to online applications and native apps.
role: As a Product Developer I get to design and build websites and applications using the latest technologies to create rich and interactive online experiences. Part of my role is to also continually learn new technologies, user experience principals and best coding practices to improve my skills and share knowledge with my colleagues.
